title: Develop to Earn
description: Open source developers are not rewarded monetarily enough. Platforms offer nonredeemable "points" for contributions rather than crypto.
solution: A Codewars and Stack Overflow type experience that rewards contributors with Cardano native utility tokens with on-platform functionality.
experience: As Plutus pioneers and users of Codewars, Stack Overflow, GitHub and other coding platforms we find ourselves to be well positioned to help.
